Our Services

Comprehensive IT solutions tailored to your business needs

Microsoft Products & Services

Complete Microsoft ecosystem implementation and support including:

  • Microsoft 365 deployment and migration
  • Windows Server configuration and management
  • SQL Server optimization and maintenance
  • Active Directory design and implementation
  • Exchange Server setup and migration

Azure Cloud Solutions

Full-service Azure cloud implementation and management:

  • Cloud migration strategy and execution
  • Azure infrastructure design and deployment
  • Cost optimization and resource management
  • Disaster recovery and backup solutions
  • Azure security and compliance

Infrastructure & Hardware

On-premises and hybrid infrastructure solutions:

  • Server hardware selection and configuration
  • Storage array design and implementation
  • Network infrastructure planning
  • Data center design and optimization
  • Hardware lifecycle management

Security Solutions

Comprehensive security and compliance services:

  • Firewall configuration and management
  • Endpoint security implementation
  • Security policy development
  • Compliance auditing and reporting
  • Incident response and forensics

Azure Virtual Desktop

Complete Azure Virtual Desktop solutions:

  • AVD environment design and deployment
  • User profile management and optimization
  • Application delivery and management
  • Performance monitoring and tuning
  • Cost optimization strategies

Citrix Solutions

Expert Citrix virtualization and workspace solutions:

  • Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops (CVAD)
  • Citrix Cloud and hybrid deployments
  • Citrix Gateway and security configurations
  • Citrix NetScaler load balancing and optimization
  • Citrix Workspace optimization
  • Migration from on-premises to cloud

Support & Maintenance

Ongoing support and maintenance services:

  • Reliable technical support
  • Proactive monitoring and maintenance
  • System updates and patching
  • Performance optimization
  • Disaster recovery planning

Why Choose Our Services?

Certified Expertise

Microsoft Certified professionals with deep expertise in the latest technologies and best practices.

Rapid Deployment

Efficient project delivery with minimal downtime and maximum business continuity.

Cost Effective

Optimized solutions that deliver maximum value while minimizing total cost of ownership.

LJ Consulting

Professional IT services for Microsoft products, Azure Cloud, and enterprise infrastructure solutions.
